title: In the layout or sub-division of such land admeasuring up to 2 Ha
clause_text: In the layout or sub-division of such land admeasuring up to 2 Ha., 10% of land shall be provided for public utilities and amenities, like electric sub-station, bus-station, sub-post office, police outâ€“post, garden, play ground, school, dispensary and such other amenities / utilities as may be considered necessary. In case of land admeasuring more than 2 ha., such amenity space shall be 10% upto 2 ha. area and 15% for the area over and above 2 ha.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
